page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I get up at 7am every morning and then have my breakfast and watch TV.When I am ready , my friends run me to school for nine o'clock.My teacher is Mrs Calder and there are only 8 in the whole school. At 10.30 we have our milk and then go out to play .When we come in we do maths and watch "Good Health" on TV.At 12.00 we stop for lunch.I have a school lunch but some people have a packed lunch.Outside we play" Kick the Can" or"Rounders" until afternoon school starts.Soon it is time to go home.Mum comes in the car to pick me and my friends up. Children's television is on and I watch it till my dad comes home from work to tea.I get ready for the Junior Boy's Brigade I like going to it because we play games and we have an inspection before going home.
